metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18862 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: maidag in GNU Mailutils before 3.8 is installed setuid and allows local privilege escalation in the url mode.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to Debian: /usr/sbin/maidag not installed suid root on Debian

criterions.comment: mailutils package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
